text: muhajir mattu ansarâ€Œgala paiki (satya svikaradalli) itarellariginta modaligaradavaru mattu atyuttama ritiyalli avarannu anusarisidavaru â€“ avarinda allahanu santustanadanu mattu avaru allahaninda santustaradaru. Avanu avarigagi, talabhagadalli nadigalu hariyuttiruvantaha svarga totagalannu sidhdhagolisittiruvanu. Avaru avugalalli sadakala iruvaru. Idu nijakku maha vijayavagide
